main event: An employee of the Dayton Power & Light Company observed a bright light in the sky for 15 seconds before it moved off at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The sighting occurred while the observer was watching television,The observer noted the bright light in the sky to the west,The weather was clear at the time of the observation,The observer is considered reliable and intelligent,An estimate diagram of the object's location and movement was attached.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: an employee of the Dayton Power & Light Company
